heading: Sunday
text: Sunshine with mixed clouds. A few lingering snow showers. Highs from the teens in the north, increasing into the 20s in the south. Light wind.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Periods of clouds, giving way to more clearing overnight. Lows from ten below zero in the north, to near 0 in the south, negative teens possible in the cold hollows.

heading: Monday
text: Some morning sun, mixing with more cloud cover in the afternoon. Increasing chance of snow showers arriving first in the west in the afternoon. Highs in the single digits to teens in the north, teens to low 20s in the south.
